archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: BI Statistical Analysis
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Business Intelligence analytic functions used for mathematical and statistical analysis of data. Information includes, but is not limited to � on market; knowledge of the market shares by region with general trends, potentials in volume, in CA � on customer and consumer; calculation of the customer average revenues according to the offer range and flow (acquisition, churn, migration). � on distribution; general trends � on competition; analysis of the market shares, positioning, target. � on Company Performances; turnover evolution, profitability, financial means � market shares by region; penetration rates of the offers by region, number of eligible lines by region.
